items.sentence: I was just wondering if Tom could possibly still be at school.
I wish I could figure out how to get Flash to work on my iPad.
If it had not been for your help, my father would have failed.
Tom laughed at Mary\'s jokes, even though they weren\'t funny.
No one is waiting at the bus stop. We may have missed the bus.
Nobody is allowed to leave the classroom until the bell rings.
Reading is the kind of habit that once acquired is never lost.
She greets him every morning as he enters the school building.
What I want for Christmas is for my family to be here with me.
Tom asked Mary some questions that she didn\'t want to answer.
